command: WITHHELD_FOR_SAFETY - mshta variant: signed-host proxy execution of locally cached HTA with minimal UI
explanation: Captures mshta launched by PowerShell with parameters to minimize UI, proxy-executing a locally cached HTA while attempting to blend into normal activity.
rationale_steps: Use PowerShell to start mshta with flags or context that avoid user prompts/windows
Execute locally cached HTA content to reduce network indicators
Rely on Microsoft-signed binary trust to traverse basic application control
Hunt for mshta instances with no visible window, short lifetimes, and suspicious parentage
Use ASR rules to block Office/PowerShell spawning script interpreters
